intro: Fimbristylis rigidifolia, commonly known as the rigid false莎草, is a species of flowering plant in the family Cyperaceae. It is a perennial herb that typically grows in wet or marshy environments, often found in tropical and subtropical regions. The plant has slender, grass-like stems with narrow, linear leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Its small, inconspicuous flowers are arranged in spikelets, which are characteristic of the Cyperaceae family. Fimbristylis rigidifolia is notable for its ability to thrive in waterlogged soils and its role in stabilizing wetland ecosystems.
